soccer.common

Class MovingObj

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.MovingObj
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, Player

    public abstract class MovingObj
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a generic template for moving objects such as ball and players. It represents the state vector of a point in 2D
